description:
Yooka-Laylee is a charming 3D platformer where players control Yooka, a chameleon, and Laylee, a bat,
as they jump, glide, and roll through vibrant levels filled with puzzles, enemies, and collectibles.
With a variety of abilities and quirky characters to encounter, players must utilize their skills to
defeat enemies, uncover secrets, and save the day from the nefarious Capital B.

1.0.0-beta.4.description:
Fourth BETA release of Yooka-Laylee in Archipelago.

# Changes

- Update location IDs to avoid conflicts with other games
- Fix game name so it actually works

# Known Bugs

- Generation may fail due to earlygame item placement constraints. It may take a few attempts to successfully generate a Yooka-Laylee-only multiworld. Adding other games may help mitigate this issue.

# Installation

Add `yooka_laylee.apworld` to your Archipelago installation's `/lib/worlds/` folder.

# Usage

Update `yooka_laylee.yaml` with your preferred username, then use for generation as normal.

Available configurations:
- Force local first item:
  - `true`: Force the first check of the game (Trowzer's Tail Twirl) to have an ability that allows you to progress
  - `false`: Allows the ability you need to progress to be placed in any world's early location
- Flappy Flight location:
  - `force_early`: Force Flappy Flight to be in the first set of abilities given
  - `allow_early`: Allow Flappy Flight to be in the first set of abilities given
  - `vanilla`: Flappy Flight is given by Trowzer after Capital Cashino
  - `anywhere`: Flappy Flight can be anywhere
- Prevent Tropics BK:
  - `true`: Force an ability that allows you to access Tribalstack Tropics into a location in your world
  - `false`: Allow all of the abilities that allow you to access Tribalstack Tropics to be placed in any world

# Client Mod

Use [this release of YLRandomizer](https://github.com/SunnyBat/YLRandomizer/releases/tag/1.0.0-beta.4.1) with Yooka-Laylee.

# Uninstallation

Remove `yooka_laylee.apworld` from your Archipelago installation's `/lib/worlds/` folder.
1.0.0-beta.4.title: 1.0.0-beta.4

1.0.0-beta.5.description:
Fifth BETA release of Yooka-Laylee in Archipelago.

# Changes

- Fix Lighthouse location ID
- Fix Setup Guide name
- Add Capital B Pagie Count option
- Add Skip Quizzes option
- DeathLink works now

# Known Bugs

- (*This may be fixed, please report any generation failures you encounter in the Archipelago `future-game-design/Yooka-Laylee` Discord thread*) Generation may fail due to earlygame item placement constraints. It may take a few attempts to successfully generate a Yooka-Laylee-only multiworld. Adding other games may help mitigate this issue.

# Installation

Add `yooka_laylee.apworld` to your Archipelago installation's `/lib/worlds/` folder.

# Usage

Update `yooka_laylee.yaml` with your preferred username, then use for generation as normal.

Available configurations:
- Force local first item:
  - `true`: Force the first check of the game (Trowzer's Tail Twirl) to have an ability that allows you to progress
  - `false`: Allows the ability you need to progress to be placed in any world's early location
- Flappy Flight location:
  - `force_early`: Force Flappy Flight to be in the first set of abilities given
  - `allow_early`: Allow Flappy Flight to be in the first set of abilities given
  - `vanilla`: Flappy Flight is given by Trowzer after Capital Cashino
  - `anywhere`: Flappy Flight can be anywhere
- Prevent Tropics BK:
  - `true`: Force an ability that allows you to access Tribalstack Tropics into a location in your world
  - `false`: Allow all of the abilities that allow you to access Tribalstack Tropics to be placed in any world
- Pagies Required for Capital B:
  - Minimum `0`, Maximum `145`
  - There are a total of 145 Pagies in the item pool
- Disable Quizzes
  - `true`: Quizzes are disabled, and you will automatically progress past them instead of having to take them
  - `false`: Quizzes are enabled, and you will have to pass them once when you first get to that point in the game

# Client Mod

Use [this release of YLRandomizer](https://github.com/SunnyBat/YLRandomizer/releases/tag/1.0.0-beta.5) with Yooka-Laylee.

# Uninstallation

Remove `yooka_laylee.apworld` from your Archipelago installation's `/lib/worlds/` folder.
1.0.0-beta.5.title: 1.0.0-beta.5

1.0.0-beta.6.description:
Sixth BETA release of Yooka-Laylee in Archipelago.

# Changes

- Fix some location ability requirements
- Fix Hurdle Hijinx IDs
- Make Capital Cashino token requirements work properly
- Fix doc title
- Make early Flappy Flight less likely when earlygame anti-BK Flappy Flight is allowed

# Known Bugs

None

# Installation

Add `yooka_laylee.apworld` to your Archipelago installation's `/lib/worlds/` folder.

# Usage

Update `yooka_laylee.yaml` with your preferred username, then use for generation as normal.

Available configurations:
- Force local first item:
  - `true`: Force the first check of the game (Trowzer's Tail Twirl) to have an ability that allows you to progress
  - `false`: Allows the ability you need to progress to be placed in any world's early location
- Flappy Flight location:
  - `force_early`: Force Flappy Flight to be in the first set of abilities given
  - `allow_early`: Allow Flappy Flight to be in the first set of abilities given
  - `vanilla`: Flappy Flight is given by Trowzer after Capital Cashino
  - `anywhere`: Flappy Flight can be anywhere
- Prevent Tropics BK:
  - `true`: Force an ability that allows you to access Tribalstack Tropics into a location in your world
  - `false`: Allow all of the abilities that allow you to access Tribalstack Tropics to be placed in any world
- Pagies Required for Capital B:
  - Minimum `0`, Maximum `145`
  - There are a total of 145 Pagies in the item pool
- Disable Quizzes
  - `true`: Quizzes are disabled, and you will automatically progress past them instead of having to take them
  - `false`: Quizzes are enabled, and you will have to pass them once when you first get to that point in the game

# Client Mod

Use [this release of YLRandomizer](https://github.com/SunnyBat/YLRandomizer/releases/tag/1.0.0-beta.6.1) with Yooka-Laylee.

# Uninstallation

Remove `yooka_laylee.apworld` from your Archipelago installation's `/lib/worlds/` folder.
1.0.0-beta.6.title: 1.0.0-beta.6

1.0.0-beta.7.description:
Seventh BETA release of Yooka-Laylee in Archipelago.

# Changes

- Add tome entrance randomization. The only restriction is that Galleon Galaxy cannot be the first world (eg where the Tribalstack Tropics tome leads to) in order to prevent Flappy Flight from being even more likely than it already is to be placed early

# Known Bugs

None

# Installation

Add `yooka_laylee.apworld` to your Archipelago installation's `/lib/worlds/` folder.

# Usage

Update `yooka_laylee.yaml` with your preferred username, then use for generation as normal.

Available configurations:
- Force local first item:
  - `true`: Force the first check of the game (Trowzer's Tail Twirl) to have an ability that allows you to progress
  - `false`: Allows the ability you need to progress to be placed in any world's early location
- Flappy Flight location:
  - `force_early`: Force Flappy Flight to be in the first set of abilities given
  - `allow_early`: Allow Flappy Flight to be in the first set of abilities given
  - `vanilla`: Flappy Flight is given by Trowzer after Capital Cashino
  - `anywhere`: Flappy Flight can be anywhere
- Prevent Tropics BK:
  - `true`: Force an ability that allows you to access Tribalstack Tropics into a location in your world
  - `false`: Allow all of the abilities that allow you to access Tribalstack Tropics to be placed in any world
- Pagies Required for Capital B:
  - Minimum `0`, Maximum `145`
  - There are a total of 145 Pagies in the item pool
- Grand Tome Randomization
  - `true`: Grand Tomes in Hivory Towers will lead to a random world (Exception: The Tribalstack tome cannot lead to Galleon Galaxy)
  - `false`: Grand Tomes in Hivory Towers will lead to their vanilla worlds
- Disable Quizzes
  - `true`: Quizzes are disabled, and you will automatically progress past them instead of having to take them
  - `false`: Quizzes are enabled, and you will have to pass them once when you first get to that point in the game

# Client Mod

Use [this release of YLRandomizer](https://github.com/SunnyBat/YLRandomizer/releases/tag/1.0.0-beta.7.1) with Yooka-Laylee.

# Uninstallation

Remove `yooka_laylee.apworld` from your Archipelago installation's `/lib/worlds/` folder.
1.0.0-beta.7.title: 1.0.0-beta.7

1.0.0-beta.8.description:
Eighth BETA release of Yooka-Laylee in Archipelago.

# Changes

- Fix for AP 0.6.3
- Assist Tubbz is now in Expanded Glacier
- Cashino Quills no longer requires Galaxy entry
- Wager Laser always requires Camo Cloak due to explicit game check
- Tribalstack Quills requires Buddy Slam and Buddy Bubble

# Known Bugs

None

# Installation

Add `yooka_laylee.apworld` to your Archipelago installation's `custom_worlds` folder.
Previous versions specified that the apworld went in `/lib/worlds` -- the apworld should be deleted from that folder if present.

# Usage

To generate a YAML for Yooka-Laylee, use `Generate Template Options` from the Archipelago Launcher. The generated YAML has also been attached to this release for convenience.

# Client Mod

Use [this release of YLRandomizer](https://github.com/SunnyBat/YLRandomizer/releases/tag/1.0.0-beta.7.1) with Yooka-Laylee.

# Uninstallation

Remove `yooka_laylee.apworld` from your Archipelago installation's `custom_worlds` folder.
1.0.0-beta.8.title: 1.0.0-beta.8
